documentation.title: Deprecated Function Parameters
documentation.standard: Please refrain from passing deprecated WordPress function parameters. In case, you need to pass an optional parameter positioned after the deprecated parameter, only ever pass the default value.

code.title: Valid: not passing a deprecated parameter.

code_comparison.code: // First - and only - parameter deprecated. get_the_author();
// First - and only - parameter deprecated. get_the_author( $string );

code.title: Valid: passing default value for a deprecated parameter.

code_comparison.code: // Third parameter deprecated in WP 2.3.0. add_option( 'option_name', 123, '', 'yes' );

code.title: Invalid: not passing the default value for a deprecated parameter.

code_comparison.code: // Third parameter deprecated in WP 2.3.0. add_option( 'my_name', 123, 'oops', 'yes' );
